title: Job Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Intelligent Personalized Mathematics Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematical concepts and basic proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Targeting current elementary teachers, aims to develop personalized math education competencies in smart learning environments, providing adaptive content via individual learning data and conducting project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual math learning deficiencies and develop personalized improvement plans using intelligent systems
Learners can achieve over 85% learning objective attainment rates using microlearning content in mobile environments
Learners can design and execute over three individualized math education projects through data-driven learning path recommendation systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
